Uses of Class
mgui.datasources.DataSourceDriver

  • Packages that use DataSourceDriver 
    Package Description
    mgui.datasources
    This package contains the core classes for data source functionality.
    mgui.datasources.mysql  
    mgui.datasources.odbc  
    mgui.datasources.postgresql  
    mgui.datasources.tinysql  
    mgui.datasources.util  
    mgui.interfaces
    This package contains all main interface objects (object which provides user interations) for ModelGUI.
    mgui.interfaces.datasources
    This package provides interface objects which allow the user to interface with the core data source classes.
    mgui.interfaces.datasources.tinysql  
    mgui.io.domestic.datasources

      java.lang.String DataField.getSQLString(DataSourceDriver driver)
      Returns an SQL string representing this field, formatted to suit a specific driver (since the JDBC standard is not always used in a standard way....)

    • Uses of DataSourceDriver in mgui.datasources.util

      Methods in mgui.datasources.util with parameters of type DataSourceDriver 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String DataSourceFunctions.getAddFieldStatement(java.lang.String table, DataField field, DataSourceDriver driver)
      Returns an SQL statement for adding field to table.
      static java.lang.String DataSourceFunctions.getChangePrimaryKeyStatement(java.lang.String table, DataField new_field, DataSourceDriver driver)
      Returns an SQL statement to update table by adding or dropping a primary key for new_field.
      static java.lang.String DataSourceFunctions.getRemoveFieldStatement(java.lang.String table, java.lang.String field, DataSourceDriver driver)
      Returns an SQL statement for removing field from table.
      static java.lang.String DataSourceFunctions.getRenameFieldStatement(java.lang.String table, java.lang.String old_name, java.lang.String new_name, DataSourceDriver driver)
      Returns an SQL statement to rename old_field to new_field.
      static java.lang.String DataSourceFunctions.getRenameTableStatement(java.lang.String old_name, java.lang.String new_name, DataSourceDriver driver)
      Returns an SQL statement to rename old_table to new_table.
      static java.lang.String DataSourceFunctions.getUpdateFieldStatement(java.lang.String table, DataField old_field, DataField new_field, DataSourceDriver driver)
      Returns an SQL statement to update old_field to match new_field.
